pages.title: Level 0: Let's Move!
pages.body: This is Ms. Roboto. She's fresh off the assembly line and needs training from scratch on the basics of being a robot.

pages.title: Goal
pages.body: Let's start with getting Ms. Roboto to move through a maze to the goal.

pages.title: Instructions
pages.body:
Drag and drop the functions to complete the action
Hit 'Run' to see your algorithm execute
See the code that makes Ms. Roboto come alive!

pages.title: Goal
pages.body: You can teach Ms. Roboto to turn left and right. Use turning to get Ms. Roboto to her goal.

pages.title: Level 2: Zap the contrived obstacle
pages.body: Teach Ms. Roboto to use her laser

pages.title: Goal
pages.body: Ms. Roboto will encounter obstacles in her environment. Teach her how to overcome obstacles and continue on to her goal.

pages.title: Instructions
